A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi has absolutely stunning and incredible visuals!! However\, the story is kind of confusing and could have been better\, and the side quest with Rose and Finn was kind of distracting and dumb\, but you know it’s what we got. And with Snoke\, that’s a different story (recommend looking up theories and the history of the director\, it’ll make more sense) but I mainly saw this because I LOVED The Force Awakens and wanted to see more of my bae\, Kylo Ren! But overall\, not the best Star Wars\, but for pure entertainment and visual satisfaction it succeeds!!
